original_title: The Big Fat Film Festival Of 85'
overview: Entering into the greatest film festival of the year, Oscar, Robbie and their two best friends are set to make the best superhero film of all time. Due to unforeseen circumstances they will need to finish the film all whilst being bullied by the biggest bully who ever bullied.
tagline: The greatest film festival of the 80s
title: The Big Fat Film Festival Of 85'
